context: Large agricultural cooperative facing climate change impacts and input cost pressures, evaluating precision farming technology adoption

request.purpose: GPS-guided tractors, drone monitoring, AI crop analytics, and variable rate irrigation systems
request.justification: 30% yield variability due to weather, 25% input waste, climate change adaptation needs, market demand for sustainable practices

business_impact.expected_outcome: Improved yields, reduced input costs, climate resilience, sustainable certification

lessons_learned: Farmer training and support critical for adoption, pilot programs essential for proving value, data ownership agreements important for trust
